title: Gateway Preference
description: A mechanisms gateways in the Freifunk Stuttgart network use to announce their willingness to accept new nodes

version.description: The protocol version. Only version 1 exists at the moment.

timestamp.description: UNIX timestamp of the time the values in this document were sampled.

^[0-9]+$.description: The preference description in a segment. The gateway MUST advertise segments which it serves, but it MAY announce segments which it doesn't serve.

preference.description: The gateway's willingness to accept new nodes in the given segment. 100 means most willing.
